Klaus Mueller.description: back at the library working on his research paper (conversing about amplifying marginalized voices and promoting diversity at an upcoming poetry reading event by incorporating different cultural perspectives, engaging with local communities, exploring intersectionality of race and gender, collaborating with Black creators and organizations, and ensuring inclusivity and accessibility for all attendees.) @ the Ville:artist's co-living space:common room:common room sofa

Ayesha Khan.description: studying and working on her senior thesis at the library (conversing about Eddy Lin and Ayesha Khan are discussing ways to promote diversity, inclusivity, and equity in their collaborative project by incorporating elements of Black music genres and African American literature, addressing cultural appropriation, and working towards dismantling systemic racism within the music industry and literature world.) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table
